casebody.data:
Alberto AMPERO
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 14, 2017

Naomi T. Fetterman, in support of the petition.

Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Alberto Ampero's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn.App. 670, 157 A.3d 1192 (2017), is denied.
